bio.about:
I've been working for +5 years as a Front-End developer.
My journey began in the dynamic world of startups, where I learned about agile methodologies, collaborative problem-solving and communicating with tech, design and product teams.
I am passionate about latest web technologies and trends, continuously exploring new frameworks and tools to push the boundaries of what's possible in front-end development.

experiences.description: I was responsible for maintaining and refactoring Filimo School project core and components, implementing campaigns, optimizing and improving performace.

Started working as a full-time remote software developer at Buzzjective based in Berlin. I was responsible for implementing new features in web and panel pages, hunting bugs in product and trying to fix them, writing e2e tests and onboarding new colleagues. It was my first experience working with Non-Iranian and international product and team, which helped me a lot to improve my English speaking.

Experience of being in a startup with a high number of users and +300 team members. Being in different functional and cross-fucntional teams to achive the team goals. I was responsible for code review of Basalam products (incudes ADS, KARBALAD and VENDOR), implementing, and maintaining the front-end page and features (like spinning wheel, shopping cart, product page, ...) and a lot of campaigns. Also tried to develop and own products like ADS (ads.basalam.com), Karbalad (karbalad.basalam.com) and Vendors (vendor.basalam.com).
I've started front-end development journey and have gained a lot of experience in front-end.
